name: Wadi

services.title: User Interface Development
services.description: Implementing user interface components using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript with frameworks like React or Vue.js.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Optimizing website performance by minimizing load times and reducing resource consumption

services.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
services.description: Testing and debugging code to address compatibility issues and maintain accessibility standards.

services.title: Interactive Feature Implementation
services.description: Utilizing JavaScript libraries and frameworks to create seamless user interactions and improve functionality.

services.title: Mentoring Team member
services.description: I help junior and medior developers to achieve their goals by planning knowledge sharing sessions

services.title: Automated testing
services.description: I am experienced in implemnting unit tests and integration test to improve product quality.

aboutpara: 7+ years of Frontend Engineering with experience in building responsive websites and web applications by following the latest coding standards! I make sure to cover my code with automated test, do/receive reviews and deliver a documented results.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Vue, Typescript, and most recent frontend  features.

experiences.bullets: Created features with precise attention to detail matching pixel-perfect designs, Staying up-to-date with the latest Frontend trends, Ensuring responsiveness and mobile ready components by considering UI/UX standards,  Contributed to decision-making to improve user and developer experiences, mplemented security measure to prevent XSS attacks, Provided clear communication and conducted regular code reviews for enhanced project quality

Build and manage web applications using modern technologies, Collaborate with diverse teams to design and integrate new features and functions into web applications, Maintain and update full-stack applications using the latest web technologies, Ensure seamless teamwork and coordination for successful implementation of web application features and functionalities

Contributed to all development stages for crafting a media-focused web app serving volunteering and organizations, Utilized Rest API for accessing and managing textual web resources, Designed templates in Photoshop and seamlessly integrated into the client-side, Developed an advanced matching system facilitating automated preference: grouping event suggestions and real-time localization for organizations and volunteers

Led a team of engineers involved in coaching and developing a multi-platform application providing advisory services for businesses and telecommunications operators, Implemented API management systems and unit tests to enhance code quality, following Scrum methodology, Played a key role in significantly improving user experience through scalable API management and rigorous unit testing efforts, Spearheaded to scale up user experience by focusing on API management and code quality enhancements within the development team
